definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing/aiding and abetting wicked deeds
ear dirt/common word for earwax 耵聹|耵聍
to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing/aiding and abetting wicked deeds
to eat humble pie/to accept humiliation/to turn the other cheek
lit. with disheveled hair and a dirty face/of unkempt appearance (idiom)

sentences.english: Smegma suitable for bacterial growth, it can cause Yin head and inflammation of the foreskin.
sentences.chinese: 包皮垢适宜细菌生长，故可引起阴经头及包皮发炎。

sentences.english: Repentance is Dharma. Repentance is like water, it can wash away filth.
sentences.chinese: 忏就是法，忏譬如水，能够洗涤垢秽。

sentences.english: Has the hate for dirt, however, gone too far?
sentences.chinese: 然而，必欲到“垢”而后快，也太过份了吧？

sentences.english: Results from analysis on the scaling things show that scaling things are calcium carbonate scales.
sentences.chinese: 经对结垢物的分析，确定其为碳酸钙垢。

sentences.english: Sulfate scale of boiler is difficult to remove by chemical cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸盐垢是化学清洗中较难清洗的垢物。

sentences.english: Sulfate scale of boiler is difficult to remove by chemical cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸盐垢是化学清洗中较难清洗的垢物。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a silicate scale clearing agent for a ternary combination flooding extraction well.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种三元复合驱采出井硅酸盐垢清垢剂。

sentences.english: It is used in cooling water circulation system with scale inhibitor etc. Mix built up scale corrosion inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 用于循环冷却水系统中与阻垢剂等复配成阻垢缓蚀剂。

sentences.english: Now is the time to go deep into our minds to wash away afflictions and filth.
sentences.chinese: 现在应该要从内心深入，来洗除烦恼垢秽的时候。

sentences.english: Brain thick layer of yellow dirt first.
sentences.chinese: 脑部有一层黄色厚头垢。

definition: to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing/aiding and abetting wicked deeds
tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
